hotels.title: Fort Worth Downtown Stay in Heritage Building With Top-Floor Bar
hotels.description: Located in a renowned Fort Worth heritage structure erected in 1921, Kimpton Harper Hotel, an IHG Hotel, seamlessly merges the city's storied past with contemporary flair. Take to the 24th-floor bar and sip craft cocktails while looking out onto the Texas plains, and delight in the flavours of modern Italian cuisine at il Modo, the bustling ground-floor restaurant. Beyond the hotel, discover wild rodeos, the historic Stockyards and the laidback streets of Downtown, just steps away.

hotels.title: Elegant Fort Worth Downtown Stay with Six Dining Outlets & Rooftop Heated Pool
hotels.description: Succumb to the call of Texas with a stay in the heart of Downtown Fort Worth, known as the birthplace of boot-scootin' cowboy country. Experience the charm of a bygone era with a trip to the Stockyards Museum, brimming with old-school memorabilia, catch the excitement of an authentic rodeo, and hoedown with the locals at the liveliest honky-tonk in town - Billy Bobâ€™s. When it's time to feast, Omni Fort Worth Hotel is home to two quintessentially Texas restaurants, Bob's Steak & Chop House and Cast Iron Restaurant, both serving the flavours of the south. Enjoy a tipple at the Wine Thief wine bar, sip top-shelf liquor at Whisky & Rye, and savour a refreshing cocktail poolside at Water Horse Pool Bar.
